title: Voltmeter installation
fullText:
A system voltmeter shall be installed on the main switchboard if the system is permanently connected toâ€”
(a)	motor circuits; or
(b)	a generator; or
(c)	an inverter. If the inverter does not have a true sinusoidal output, the voltmeter shall be a true r.m.s. type.
NOTE: The inverter voltmeter may be installed in proximity to the switchboard.
